promoCards.title: Heartbeat: Bureau Agent
powers: Select a hero. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that hero is dealt damage, you may destroy one of your ongoing cards. If you do, prevent that damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One player may play a card.
Reduce the next damage dealt to a hero target by 2.

cards.title: Heartbeat
powers: Search your deck or trash for a copy of Arcane Charge and put it into play. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One player may use a power.
Choose a hero. The next damage dealt by that hero is increased by 2.

openingLines.default: If we take you out, your plans will fall.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.MourningCodeCharacte: This is outside my expertise, but I'll stop you anyway!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: As long as there is life in my chest, it's not over yet.

cards.title: Arcane Charge
cards.body: When this card is destroyed, increase the next damage dealt by {Heartbeat} by 2. After {Heartbeat} takes damage, you may destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: This thing is literally keeping me alive.{br}But it can do more than just that.

cards.title: Energy Leakage
cards.body: At the end of your turn, {Heartbeat} deals as many targets as there are Arcane Charges in play 1 radiant damage each.
cards.flavorText: Stay away! I'm... how do I explain this...{br}radioactive!

cards.title: Arcane Repulsion
powers: You may destroy an Arcane Charge. If you do, draw a card and reduce damage dealt to {Heartbeat} by 1 until the start of your turn. {Heartbeat} deals 1 target 1 radiant damage.

cards.title: Unstable Power Source
cards.body: Increase radiant damage dealt by {Heartbeat} by 1. At the end of your turn, {Heartbeat} deals herself radiant damage equal to the number of Arcane Charges in play.
cards.flavorText: AAAAH! What the heck is this thing?

cards.title: Explosive Release
cards.body: Destroy an Arcane Charge. If you do, {Heartbeat} deals each non-hero target irreducible fire damage equal to the number of Arcane Charges in play plus 1.

cards.title: Total Discharge
cards.body: Destroy all Arcane Charges. {Heartbeat} deals 1 target X melee and X radiant damage, where X is the number of cards destroyed this way.

cards.title: Percussive Maintenance
cards.body: {Heartbeat} deals herself 1 melee damage. If she takes damage this way, put a copy of Arcane Charge from your trash into play, then play a card.
cards.flavorText: {cough!} Hang on. Got something stuck in{br}my chest.

cards.title: Rejuvenate
cards.body: {Heartbeat} gains 2 HP. You may destroy a copy of Arcane Charge. If you do, {Heartbeat} gains an additional 1 HP and deals 1 target 1 radiant damage.
cards.flavorText: Whoof. Hah. I thought I was a goner{br}for sure.

cards.title: Deadly Dance
cards.body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Heartbeat} by 1. Whenever an Arcane Charge enters play, {Heartbeat} deals 1 target 1 melee damage.
powers: {Heartbeat} deals up to 3 targets 1 melee damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: How do you move like that?
You want me to teach you?

cards.title: Antipathetic Field
cards.body: Whenever {Heartbeat} takes radiant damage, reduce the next damage dealt to {Heartbeat} by the damage dealt that way.
powers: {Heartbeat} deals 1 target and herself 1 radiant damage each. Reduce the next damage dealt by non-hero targets dealt damage this way by 1.

cards.title: Arcane Revival
cards.body: Search your deck for an ongoing card and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. {Heartbeat} regains 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: We can rebuild her. We have the magic.

cards.title: Clear the Field
cards.body: Destroy up to 3 ongoing cards. {Heartbeat} draws up to X cards and deals up to X targets 1 radiant damage each where X is the number of hero cards destroyed this way.

cards.title: Pulse
cards.body: {Heartbeat} deals each non-hero target 1 radiant damage, then deals each non-hero target 1 melee damage. Draw a card.

cards.title: Illuminate
cards.body: {Heartbeat} may deal up to 5 targets 2 radiant damage each. Each hero that takes damage this way draws 2 cards.
